name: Twilight Souls
description:
Description:
Play as Lunae, on a journey to break the curse of darkness.


Credits: 

- Music "Rose At Meridiem" by NemesisTheory
https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/280967


Controls:

Type A
- Arrows : Move
- Z : Jump
- X : Attack
- C : Stasis
- R : Reset

Type B
- AWSD: Move
- K / SPACE : Jump
- J : Attack
- N : Stasis
